deliveryDescription: We offer various delivery and payment options for your convenience. Please check out our services and terms to make your order as pleasant as possible.
warrantyText1: Our company guarantees high product quality and offers the possibility of returning goods in case of dissatisfaction or defects.
warrantyText2: We care about our customers and are ready to solve all issues to make your shopping experience as pleasant as possible.
warrantyText3: If you are not satisfied with the purchased product, please contact our support service for a return or exchange.
loyaltyText1: Our loyalty program is a special offer for our regular customers. Join our program and receive regular discounts, bonuses, and other pleasant perks.
loyaltyBenefitsTitle: Benefits of participating in the program:
loyaltyStep2: Make purchases and earn bonuses for each purchase
loyaltyStep3: Redeem bonuses for discounts and gifts
loyaltyRule1: Earn 5 bonuses for every 100 UAH spent
loyaltyRule2: Bonuses can be used on future purchases
loyaltyLastText: Join our loyalty program and enjoy exclusive benefits from our store ðŸ¤—
giftCardsText1: A gift card is the perfect way to give a gift to your loved ones and friends. It allows them to choose the product they want.
giftCardsPurchaseTitle: How to purchase a gift card:
giftCardsStep2: Choose the amount and design of the card
giftCardsStep3: Pay and receive the gift card
giftCardsBenefitsTitle: Benefits of using a gift card:
giftCardsBenefit1: Ability to choose any product in our store
giftCardsBenefit2: The card is valid for 12 months
giftCardsBenefit3: Can be used for multiple purchases
giftCardsLastText: Give a gift that everyone will love. Gift cards are a convenient and practical way to give joy and choice to your loved ones ðŸ˜Š
aboutText1: We are your trusted partner in the world of shopping. Our store offers a wide range of high-quality products at affordable prices.
aboutMissionText: We strive to provide our customers with the best shopping experience by offering quality products and excellent service.
contactsDescription: We are always happy to answer your questions and provide assistance. Contact us using the following contact details:

careerPage.title: Career
careerPage.description: Join us to realize your potential and develop your skills. We are looking for talented and motivated people to join our team.
careerPage.howToApply: To apply for a vacancy, send your resume to our email at: hr@mail.artisan-shop.biz.ua
careerPage.emailNote: Please mention the job title in the subject line of your email and include your contact details.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqPage.description: Below are the most frequently asked questions and their answers. If you have other questions, please contact our customer service department.

questions.browseProducts: How do I browse the list of products?
questions.searchProduct: How do I find a product by name?
questions.purchaseProduct: How do I purchase a product in the online store?
questions.register: How do I register in the online store?
questions.paymentMethods: What payment methods do you accept?

answers.browseProducts: In the header at the top left corner, there is a dropdown menu button. Clicking on it will show the list of product categories. Hovering over a category will show the list of products on the right. Clicking on a category will display the gallery of products in the current category.
answers.searchProduct: At the top of the header, there is a search box for entering product information. You can enter either the full name or a part of the product name.
answers.purchaseProduct: You need to add the product to the cart, then fill out the appropriate form and pay for the product. To purchase a product, you need to be a registered user.
answers.register: You need to click on the registration icon and fill in the required fields. After that, a verification email will be sent to the entered email address. In this email, you need to click the specified button or follow the provided link.
answers.paymentMethods: We accept cash, bank transfer, and credit cards.
answers.deliveryTime: The delivery time depends on the delivery location and the selected delivery method.
answers.returnPolicy: Yes, you can return a product within 14 days of receiving it.

returnsPage.title: Return Policy
returnsPage.description: We strive to ensure your satisfaction with every purchase. If you're not happy with a product, you can return it according to our return policy.
returnConditions: The product must be returned in its original condition.
Returns are accepted within 30 days of purchase.
Returns are only accepted with a receipt or proof of purchase.
returnInstructions: To return a product, please contact our customer service department at 0 800 000 000 or via email at support@mail.artisan-shop.biz.ua.
Please provide the reason for the return and your order number.

serviceCenterPage.title: Service Center
serviceCenterPage.description: Our service center is ready to provide you with comprehensive support and solve any issues with your products. We offer a wide range of services, including repairs, technical support, and consultations.
serviceCenterPage.contactTitle: How to Contact the Service Center:
serviceCenterPage.contactIntro: Service center by phone 0800 000 000 or email
serviceCenterPage.contactOutro: Our specialists are happy to assist you with any technical questions.
